My Favorite Classical Music Pieces

Jan 05, 2023

Concertos

  • Felix Mendelssohn, Violin Concerto in E Minor, Op. 64
  • Camille Saint-Saëns, Introduction and Rondo Capriccioso, Op. 28
  • Pablo de Sarasate, Zigeunerweisen, Op. 20
  • Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky, Violin Concerto in D Major, Op. 35
  • Johannes Brahms, Violin Concerto in D Major, Op. 77
  • Jean Sibelius, Violin Concerto in D Minor, Op. 47
  • Ludwig van Beethoven, Violin Concerto in D Major, Op. 61
  • Max Bruch, Violin Concerto No. 1 in G Minor, Op. 26
  • Sergei Rachmaninoff, Piano Concerto No. 2 in C Minor, Op.18
  • Frédéric Chopin, Piano Concerto No. 1 in E Minor, Op. 11
  • Felix Mendelssohn, Piano Concerto No. 1 in G Minor, Op. 25
  • Edvard Grieg, Piano Concerto in A Minor, Op. 16
  • Johannes Brahms, Piano Concerto No. 2 in B flat Major, Op. 83
  • Sergei Rachmaninoff, Rhapsody on a Theme of Paganini, Op. 43
  • Sergei Prokofiev, Piano Concerto No. 2 in G Minor, Op. 16
  • Zhanhao He, Gang Chen, The Butterfly Lovers Violin Concerto

Sonatas

  • Ludwig van Beethoven, Piano Sonata No. 14 in C Sharp Minor, Op. 27, No. 2
  • Ludwig van Beethoven, Violin Sonata No. 9, Op. 47

Symphonies

  • Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, Symphony No. 40 in G Minor, K. 550
  • Dmitri Shostakovich, Symphony No. 5 in D Minor, Op. 47

Others

  • Frédéric Chopin, 12 Étude, Op. 25
  • Johannes Brahms, 21 Hungarian Dances, WoO1
  • Franz Liszt, 19 Hungarian Rhapsodies, S.244, R.106
  • Frédéric Chopin, Ballade No. 1 in G Minor
  • Dmitri Shostakovich, String Quartet No. 8 in C Minor, Op. 110
  • Dimitri Shostakovich, 5 Pieces for 2 Violins and Piano
